briefdescription.para: Specialization for HdQuatf: spherical linear interpolation.

memberdef.argsstring: (float alpha, const VtArray< T > &v0, const VtArray< T > &v1)
memberdef.name: HdResampleNeighbors

briefdescription.para: Specialization for VtValue: interpolate the held values.

memberdef.argsstring: (float u, size_t numSamples, const float *us, const T *vs)
memberdef.name: HdResampleRawTimeSamples

briefdescription.para: Resample a function described by an ordered array of samples, using a linear reconstruction filter evaluated at the given parametric position u.

detaileddescription.para: The function is considered constant outside the supplied sample range.

memberdef.argsstring: (float u, size_t numSamples, const float *us, const T *vs, const VtIntArray *is)
memberdef.name: HdResampleRawTimeSamples

briefdescription.para: Resample a function described by an ordered array of samples and sample indices, using a linear reconstruction filter evaluated at the given parametric position u.

detaileddescription.para: The function is considered constant outside the supplied sample range.
